vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Historic Overlay for the Burgher Residence (4107 Turtle Creek Boulevard), on property zoned a R-7.5 (A) Single Family District, on the west side of Turtle Creek Boulevard, south of Wycliff Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval subject to preservation criteria
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to preservation criteria
Z223-306(RD)
